content:
This was sent to the Vocab WG email list, but I'm repeating it here. Apologies for sending a late notice, but we have changed the day and time of what were previously the every other week Thursday FHIR Tracker Issues calls to Wednesday at 4:00 PM Eastern (90 minutes) - beginning tomorrow! This means that we now have weekly Wednesday 4:00 PM FHIR Tracker Issues calls. This will be more convenient for some of us (including some Australians), and hopefully it should for most of us be easier to remember and maybe to manage since the calls will be the same every week.

Again, we will be having the FHIR Tracker Issues call tomorrow, Wednesday July 28 at 4:00 PM Eastern! Meeting details:

Join Zoom Meeting - https://zoom.us/j/7183806281?pwd=WHVnUUlkWWhhcnRaYk9sWWQyOEkvUT09
Meeting ID: 718 380 6281 Password: 370553
+1 646 558 8656 US (New York)
Find your local number: https://zoom.us/u/aciVC9RrJ6
